meanings: (예감·추측 등이) be right, prove right, come true (=들어맞다)
(얻어맞다) be hit, be struck; (뺨을) be slapped; (여러 차례) be beaten
(총·벼락 등을) be hit (by), (총을) be shot, (벼락을) be struck
cut one´s coat according to the cloth

examples.korean: You haven't drawn the figures in the foreground in proportion. 발음듣기 네가 전면의 인물들을 균형에 맞게 그리지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
